objects.specification: A seamless rectangular floor panel with smooth surface, colored in a medium dark grey metallic shade with subtle specular highlights. The panel has a low-profile base with a slight beveled edge, providing a sturdy foundation. Its polished finish reflects ambient lighting softly, creating an elegant showroom flooring appearance.

A tall rectangular wall panel featuring a matte black finish with a subtle metallic sheen. The surface is smooth and uniform with sharp, clean edges. The minimalistic design conveys a professional exhibition booth structure.

A sleek and aerodynamic modern car model with smooth flowing lines and a dynamic silhouette. The body is coated in a glossy vibrant red metallic paint with deep reflective qualities. Windows are tinted dark, the wheels feature black rims with subtle red accents, and trim elements combine chrome and matte black finishes for high contrast.

A minimalist reception desk composed of smooth dark grey top and front panels with clean straight edges. It includes black metal supports and thin red accent strips along the edges for branding highlights. The surface has a subtle matte finish to reduce glare.

A modern display stand with a slender silver metallic frame supporting a clear acrylic panel. The stand has a rectangular base and upright supports, with red branding accents on the frame edges for thematic consistency.

A compact ceiling-mounted spotlight unit with a cylindrical housing finished in matte grey. The front features an LED light source that emits focused bright white illumination. The housing has subtle vents and a beveled rim with integrated black mounting hardware.

A visitor chair with a padded seat and curved backrest upholstered in dark grey textured fabric. The legs are slender black metal with a slight taper, and the minimal armrests match the frame. The design is ergonomic and modern.

A vertical hanging banner made from smooth fabric with a crisp white background. It displays stylized automotive graphics and branding in red and black. The banner is attached via slim black top and bottom rods, with visible edge stitching for a finished look.
